thread.title: Mum who was STERILISED at 25 after having three kids pays £3.5k to reverse op at 39 when she falls in love with new man – and then has two more children
thread.title_full: Mum who was STERILISED at 25 after having three kids pays £3.5k to reverse op at 39 when she falls in love with new man – and then has two more children

author: nkeegan
title: Mum who was STERILISED at 25 after having three kids pays £3.5k to reverse op at 39 when she falls in love with new man – and then has two more children
text:
Mrs Crunch ‘I HADN’T GIVEN UP BEING A MUM’ Mum who was STERILISED at 25 after having three kids pays £3.5k to reverse op at 39 when she falls in love with new man – and then has two more children 
Leanne Drummond, 39, realised she'd made a mistake after meeting her husband Paul, 33 By NATALIE KEEGAN
